Reviews.Content: hotel doge tiny little hotel heart historic district rome walking distance spanish steps trevi fountain stayed double double bed matching draperies bedspread clean 4 piece bath including toilet shower sink towels looked huge dishtowels excellent job drying shower basic toiletries provides breakfast continental bread butter spreads croissants coffee hot chocolate juice appreciated daughters stayed 3 twin beds shabby little rennovation clean notice workers supplies hotel actually 2 name plaques hotel doge hotel florence difference 2 hotels note prepared stairs lift 2 floors hold 1 person 1 suitcase hotel staff helpful courteous provided city map directions taxi leaving held bags departed excellent value price paid definately stay

Reviews.Content: hard conveniently located hotel rome affordable price hotel doge fit bill concerned location indeed fantastic 5 minutes walk trevi fountain piazza di spagna spanish steps checked front desk staff friendlier told leave luggage adjoining suitcases secured left guests suitcases reassuring lunch nearby returned ready elevator tiny definitely recommended remote trace claustrophobia decided throw bags push button race upstairs 4th floor dread stairs bed reasonably comfortable featured air conditioning window view balconies peoples apartments bathroom immaculate bit larger usual european downtown hotels breakfast included pretty basic roll prepackaged pastries cappuccino decent little restore repaint walls common stairs hotel look lot course pretty basic price reasonable location perfect

Reviews.Title: “Don't sacrifice a good nights sleep for location!!!!”
Reviews.Author: adniymeon
Reviews.Content: pictured advertisement consideration booking rest 2 week european trip dont sacrifice nights sleep location save 2030 musty smell carpet filthy stains didnt walk shoes comforters looked worn bed hard reason slept night uncomfortable bed sleeping pill staff friendly mindful people light cigarette office comment supposed smoking smirking oh customer smoking breakfast sucks kitchen staff rude eat biscuits coffee breakfast youll love dont sacrifice night sleep save 30 cause youll dread day rome 10 minute walk fontana di trevi 8 mins spanish steps opposite direction close proximity 2 attractions shops metro free internet access lobby 12 stars hotel
